name: JavaCrypt
short_description:
JavaCrypt is a pure Java 7 tool to let you create checksums of files on disk and typed strings.

It is designed to be multi-threaded and run on any desktop platform that Java 7 can.

To run it you'll need Java 7 installed:
http://www.java.com
summary: Java GUI tool to generate checksums of files and typed strings
